bills.title: Generally revise laws related to presentence investigations
Establish the sexual and violent offender presentence investigation and reporting unit
Revise laws regarding receipt of workers' compensation benefits on behalf of others
Revise definition of "dependent child" in highway patrol, police, and firefighter retirement systems
Generally revise Smith River permit laws
Revise school funding laws to clarify the legislature's authority related to inflationary adjustments
Provide for fee waivers of government documents to former foster children
Criminalize disclosure of certain explicit AI-generated media
Establish the Montana family legacy home act
Establishing the Keep Montanans Housed Act
Revising laws related to transfer of a single-family dwelling
Creating the Montana endowment for early childhood and related structure
Provide for the regulation of secure youth transportation companies
